annotations:
Pls ppe
Min/Max 7,000 mt NPK in 50kgs bags and in sling bags 1MT (S/F: 1.6wog)
LP: 1SB/SA Hai Phong, Vietnam
DP: 1SBP Mombasa, Kenya
LC: 10-12 Sept, 2024
L/D rate: 1,000 MT PWWD SHINC basic 3 gangs workable
Dunnage if any on charterer's acct
Sole cargo or Combine in owner's option.
TBN is not workable
2.5%

DP: Hadia or Kolkata, India,
LC: 20-25th Sept 2024
LR: 1,500 WWD SHINC
DR: 1,000WWD SHINC
2.5%

LP: 1SBP Hon La, Vietnam
DP: 1SBP Shuwaikh, Kuwait
LC: 1st Quarter of 2025 (1 shipment each quarter)
L/D Rate: 3,000 / 3,000 PWWD SHINC
2.5%
Regards / K Y Lee–Chartering Director
